toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value is defined by the ECO No in the ECO Header and cannot be changed.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: ECO
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pecoi_econo__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field defined by the formula_extid field. Neither the formula_extid, nor the externalid field itself, is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Revision Description
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pecoi_descr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Determines the Effective Date that is applied to the following records(when this field is changed,that change is propagated to these fields)- Eng Item Rev, Eng BOM, Routing Operation.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Effective Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pecoi_effdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Specifies how many times the Effective Date has changed.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Date Change Count
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pecoi_effdatechgcount__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Determines the Revision No that is applied to the following records when this Division is under ECO control - Eng Item Rev,Eng BOM, Routing Operation.Rev No must be a value that does not violate the uniqueness of the Eng Item Revisions for this Eng Item.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Revision No
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pecoi_rev__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages
